resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81673</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81673</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4265</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching Reading To Students with ADD/H</string>
            <string language="es">Enseñanza de lectura a estudiantes con Trastorno de déficit de atención (ADD/H, Attention Déficit Disorder)</string>
            <string language="ga">Léitheoireacht a mhúineadh do dhaltaí le Neammhord Easnamh Airde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtender Messwert zu den Kursteilnehmern 
mit ADD/H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture d'enseignement aux étudiants avec ADD/H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura ensinando aos estudantes com ADD/H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura d'istruzione agli allievi con ADD/H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία που διαβάζει στους σπουδαστές με ADD/H</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Advice sheet is aimed at children with Special needs (Attention Deficit Disorder). It offers strategies for developing these childrens' reading skills.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta hoja de consejos está dirigida a niños con necesidades especiales (Trastorno de déficit de atención). Ofrece estrategias para desarrollar habilidades de lectura en estos niños.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an bileog chomhairle seo dírithe ar dhaltaí le riachtanais speisialta (Neamhord Easnamh Airde). Tugann sé straitéisí chun scileanna léitheoireachta na ndaltaí seo a fhorbairt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Rateblatt ist- angestrebte Kinder mit 
speziellen Notwendigkeiten (Aufmerksamkeit Defizit-Störung). Es
bietet Strategien für das Entwickeln von von fähigkeiten dieser 
childrens' Lesean.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette feuille de Conseil est les enfants 
visés avec les besoins spéciaux (désordre de déficit d'attention).
Elle offre des stratégies pour développer les qualifications 
de la lecture de ces childrens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta folha do conselho é crianças visadas com 
necessidades especiais (disorder de deficit de atenção). 
Oferece estratégias para desenvolver habilidades da leitura 
destes childrens'.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo foglio di consiglio è bambini puntati su 
con i bisogni speciali (disordine di deficit di attenzione). 
Offre le strategie per sviluppare le abilità della lettura di 
questi childrens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το φύλλο συμβουλών στοχεύουν στα παιδιά με 
ειδικές ανάγκες (αναταραχή διάσπασης της προσοχής). 
Προσφέρει τις στρατηγικές για τις δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης 
αυτών των childrens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
